name: RetrieveMerchantInfo
description:
Retrieve details of a specific merchant using merchant ID.

Use this tool to obtain the `Merchant` object details by providing the `merchant_id`. It should be called when users need specific information about a merchant via their unique ID.

parameters.name: merchant_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the merchant to retrieve. Use 'me' to access the current accessible merchant.

value_schema.description:
The ID of the merchant to retrieve. If the string "me" is supplied as the ID,
then retrieve the merchant that is currently accessible to this call.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: merchant_id
parameters.description:
The ID of the merchant to retrieve. If the string "me" is supplied as the ID,
then retrieve the merchant that is currently accessible to this call.

value_schema.description:
The ID of the merchant to retrieve. If the string "me" is supplied as the ID,
then retrieve the merchant that is currently accessible to this call.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
